DOC.brief_summary: Assess impact dietary omega 3 free fatty acid breast cancer patient .
DOC.brief_title: Breast , Omega 3 Free Fatty Acid , Ph 0
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , single arm , short term study correlative biomarker endpoint . Two hundred ( 200 ) newly diagnose breast cancer patient recruit participate short term ( 30 day ) Phase 0 biomarker evaluation study prior surgical resection . Patients receive fish Oil ( Omega-3 FFAs , 2700 mg mouth twice daily ) .
